about_the_game: This is a demo version. Get ready for Sphere Game Colours, an experience designed to captivate your loyal fans and win over new enthusiasts. With a complete overhaul, this game offers a fully refreshed experience, featuring stunning visuals and innovative mechanics. Overcome challenging obstacles and dive into an exciting journey where each stage introduces new and thrilling challenges. Your mission is clear: cross the portal to advance to the next level, facing a series of intriguing challenges along the way. Be prepared for an engaging experience where triumph is rewarded, and excitement is always on the horizon. Additionally, the game will feature two distinct gameplay modes: one in traditional perspective and the other in isometric view, offering a variety of experiences and fun for all types of players.
